thread.title: Togo’s Truth Revealed: CRIET Special Prosecutor Breaks Silence with Explosive Details
thread.title_full: Togo’s Truth Revealed: CRIET Special Prosecutor Breaks Silence with Explosive Details

author: newsdirectory3
title: Togo’s Truth Revealed: CRIET Special Prosecutor Breaks Silence with Explosive Details
text:
Thwarted Coup⁣ d’état in Benin: Investigation‍ Reveals Shocking Details A planned coup d’état in ⁣Benin, scheduled for September 27,‍ 2024, was foiled thanks to the vigilance of Ivorian intelligence​ services, ⁢who alerted the⁣ Beninese authorities to a suspicious‍ bank account.
Mario‌ Mètonou, Special Prosecutor of the CRIET, has released a statement ‌detailing the events⁢ surrounding the thwarted coup.
The Arrest of Oswald Homeky On the night of September⁢ 23 to 24, 2024, former sports minister ​Oswald Homeky was arrested while passing six bags full of banknotes to the Commander of ⁣the‌ Republican Guard.
The Investigation Unfolds Initial investigations reveal that ‍the Commander of the Republican ​Guard was acting on behalf of Minister Oswald Homeky and Mr. Olivier Boko, with the aim of using the armed forces to ⁤carry out​ a coup⁢ d’état ‍on September 27, 2024.
A Suspicious Bank Account On ⁣August ​6, 2024, the interested​ parties opened a bank‍ account in the books of​ NSIA BANQUE Côte ​d’Ivoire​ for the benefit ⁢of the Commander of the Republican Guard, with an initial ⁢balance of⁤ 105 million FCFA.
A Large⁤ Sum of Money To overcome the ‌opposition of the ⁤Commander ⁣of⁤ the Republican ⁣Guard, the‍ perpetrators ⁣promised and presented to him, on September​ 24, 2024, ⁣a⁤ sum of 1.5 billion FCFA in cash, divided‌ into 129 batches of​ 10 million and⁤ 42 lots ​of 5 million.
The Arrests The⁣ Criminal Brigade arrested Mr. Oswald Homeky and the Commander of ‍the‌ Republican Guard during‍ the delivery of the vehicle and the sum of⁤ 1.5 billion FCFA. Mr. Olivier Boko was also arrested shortly after.
Ongoing⁢ Investigation The ​ investigation is ⁢ongoing, and the ‌Special Prosecutor​ has promised to provide more information ‌on ‌the ⁣evolution ‍of the procedure.
Done ⁤at⁤ the Office of the Special Prosecutor, ‌September 25, 2024
The Special Prosecutor,
Elonm Mario METONOU
